titles.title: We wish you a Merry Christmas

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: We wish you a Merry Christmas; newline We wish you a Merry Christmas; newline We wish you a Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year. newline Good tidings we bring to you and your kin; newline Good tidings for Christmas and a Happy New Year.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Oh, bring us a figgy pudding; newline Oh, bring us a figgy pudding; newline Oh, bring us a figgy pudding and a cup of good cheer newline We won't go until we get some; newline We won't go until we get some; newline We won't go until we get some, so bring some out here

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: We wish you a Merry Christmas; newline We wish you a Merry Christmas; newline We wish you a Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: المجد فى الاعالى سلام على الارض وبالناس المسرة newline هللويا

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: قد زار الرعاة الطفل الرضيع لنأتى فنحظى بالحب العجيب
